body: When I go to my profile, my stats never load. I know if I type in the search bar avicus.net/bobderp37/stats it'll show my stats but I want to be able to see everything else also. Also, I can't edit my profile. yeah okay can anyone help?
body_tagged: When I go to my profile, my stats never load. I know if I type in the search bar avicus.net/bobderp37/stats it'll show my stats but I want to be able to see everything else also. Also, I can't edit my profile. yeah okay can anyone help?
title: Stats aren't showing

replies.body: Sorry dude a lot of other people have the same problem and I don't think it will get fixed anytime soon :l
replies.body_tagged: Sorry dude a lot of other people have the same problem and I don't think it will get fixed anytime soon :l

replies.body:
There's a glitch with relatively new players that doesn't allow them to see their stats, and it takes a while for it to actually get fixed. I know that my stats weren't loading up until very recently. The only thing to do is wait ;/

As for editing your profile, if the "edit profile" button doesn't work, try inserting this link in your browser.

avicus.net/[YOURNAME]/edit

Hope this helps.
